comments.text:
Why are people afraid of bees? I understand people who are allergic to bees 
would be afraid of them more, but they won't hurt you if you leave them 
alone. Plus saying the world would be a better place without them is just 
about the same as me saying the world would be a better place without nuts, 
or my sister saying it about dogs and grass, as we are allergic to those 
things. ﻿
